main.name: Riya Reddy
main.description: Mission-driven full stack developer with a passion to learn new technologies, collaboration, and teaching.
main.bio: I am a Software Developer with demonstrable experience working with SAP , Microsoft and web technologies across the full stack from the User Interface to the database,I am a strong communicator and enjoy working with stakeholders across the software development lifecycle.
main.aboutname: I am Supriya Reddy,You can call me as Riya.Basically I come from India and based in Melbourne,I can speak four diffferent languages like English,Hindi,Kannada and Telugu.
main.aboutbio: I have over 6 years of experience as a software engineer,and have worked at both small startups and large organisation.While I'm a proficient full-stack developer,I love building sites,apps and software all the way from the prototype and planning to the fully live product which can help client's to achieve their buisness outcomes.
main.aboutfocus: I'm constantly learning web technologies, currently playing around with Advanced Javascript and React.
main.aboutrole: I'm currently working as Full Stack Developer and is always interested in challenge as I love being curious.
main.aboutinterest: Outside of work,I like to be part of social gatherings,travelling,volunteering and attending meet up of my interest.

resume.skillmessage: I am a Software Developer with demonstrable experience working with SAP , Microsoft and web technologies across the full stack from the User Interface to the database,I am a strong communicator and enjoy working with stakeholders across the software development lifecycle.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: I am currently working as a full-stack web developer for the Keys project (propert.community), a cloud-based property management platform.This innovative web app serves the need of property owners, tenants,service providers and investors.

work.title: SAP ABAP Developer
work.description: I was working as SAP ABAP Developer to customise SAP software as per client's Buisness requirements using ABAP(Advanced Buisness Application Programming).
